Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<IServerPacket>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard
extends Observable<IServerPacket>
Models the player board of a player, composed by a reference to the owner, three stacks of development cards and a deposit.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlayerBoard​(Player player)
    Constructor: instantiates the slots, the deposit and the player reference.

    • hasCardOfColorAndLevel

      public boolean hasCardOfColorAndLevel​(CardColor color, int level)
      Checks if this PlayerBoard has a card with the given color and the given level.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to search for
      level - the level to search for
      Returns:
      true if found, false otherwise

    • canPlaceCardOfLevel

      public boolean canPlaceCardOfLevel​(int level, int slot)
      Checks if a card of the given level can be placed in the given slot.
      Parameters:
      level - the level of the card
      slot - the slot to place the card in (1 -> left, 2 -> center, 3 -> right)
      Returns:
      true if the card can be placed in the slot, false otherwise

      public int getDevelopmentCardsTotalVictoryPoints()
      Calculates the total amount of victory points given by all development cards on the board.

      the total amount of victory points

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(int slot, DevelopmentCard developmentCard)
      Calls for the method to push the bought development card in the desired stack.
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot where to add the card (1 -> left, 2 -> center, 3 -> right)
      developmentCard - the bought development card
